snippet: Officials are encouraging consumers to revisit the federal marketplace to compare plans and ensure that they get the right amount of financial assistance in 2015.
abstract: Health insurance companies will soon send notices to millions of customers saying their coverage is being automatically renewed for 2015, along with financial assistance from federal government, but consumer advocates say there is potential for confusion, as much information might be out of date or misleading; Obama administration emphasizes consumers should revisit marketplace to ensure they are getting correct amount of financial assistance.
lead_paragraph: Officials are encouraging consumers to revisit the federal marketplace to compare plans and ensure that they get the right amount of financial assistance in 2015.

headline.main: Health Law Has Caveat on Renewal of Coverage
headline.print_headline: Health Law Has Caveat on Renewal of Coverage

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
keywords.name: subject
